attributes.action: Reduce the speed limit to 20 mph on Dartmoor
attributes.additional_details:
There are horrendous injuries to animals occurring with cars , lorries and vans travelling at 40 miles per hour on the Dartmoor roads .
Needless injuries and suffering could be prevented if the speed limit is reduced.
attributes.background:
Reduce road speed to 20  miles per hour 
Too many preventable injuries and death occur each week on Dartmoor .

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
